Hi!

Here is a little something about me

I will never tell you I have cried from coding...

Was an industrial engineer & PM in the solar energy industry. Attended Hackbright Academy, a software engineering bootcamp for women. Finished in Dec 2019.

Am switching careers to software development.

Why programming? I believe that one language is not enough to understand other people's thoughts and not enough to express my own feelings, ideas and thoughts. I believe that if you learn to speak in someone else's language, you can better understand their logic.

I love learning programming languages, not only because it changes the way I think, but also because it helps me to embody the abstract thoughts in my mind.

For fun : weight training, live music, piano, anime, scuba diving, learning Japanese.

- My favorite therapy is puppy therapy.
- I love my dad. He says good morning to me everyday.
- I love a room full of sunshine.
- I make healthy decisions when grocery shopping and then later terribly miss the chocolate I didn't buy.
- I sometimes "accidentally" open a shopping website, add items to the shopping cart then close it.
